content.html: @Sebastian: I'm having the same problem. The linking only works when I point directly to the server's location - the header s at my homepage aren't followed. However, the process just completed first time when I tested posting an OpenID comment while logged out of my local mirror of my blog. Could be because it's a local mirror, could be because I was using IE to avoid logging out of Fx, could be because I was logged out...who knows. I submitted a bug report about it the other day. (Another bug: this comment wouldn't submit until I entered a name and e-mail!)
